divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past few years I have been seeing things in the sky over the city of Franklin. A few weeks ago I watched a multi-colored disc hover and then float across the sky at the treeline. The object made no noise. Tonight while outside I witnessed it again, however, this time I noticed that it looked different than before and was a little higher in the sky. It would move, hover, move, hover, and then the lights would get really bright. One time a beam of light came out of it as a jet was flying towards it. The jet then changed direction and headed SW instead of SSW the way it had been flying. There was also a jet to the east but it stayed on the same course. The lights that were coming off this thing were unbelievable. They were so bright when the thing was moving. I was so impressed with it that I called my dad to come outside and take a look. I think he was more excited than I was. I flipped out when I saw the photos I had taken. I have had cable for only eight days and noticed the photos looked similar to what I had seen on ufo hunters on the History channel. To make sure my camera was not acting up I took a photo of the moon and it came out normal. Please use my email address if you wish additional information. Thanks, P P.S. I have a professional grade digital camera and have worked for the local media outlets in the past.
